content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Area at position(0,0)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at position(0,0) processing iron ore
- Furnace 2 at position(2,0) processing iron ore

###Copper Smelting Area at position(4,4)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Furnace 3 at position(4,4) processing copper ore
- Furnace 4 at position(6,4) processing copper ore

###Power Generation System
Components:
- Steam engine at position(-7.5, 18.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.5, 22.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-7.5, 25.5)
- Connected by pipe groups at positions(-7.5, 15.5), (-7.5, 20.5), and (-8.5, 23.5)
- Extensive electrical network with multiple poles spanning positions from (-2.5,6.5) to (7.5,17.5)

###Research Lab Complex
Multiple labs positioned across the map:
- Labs with automation science packs:
  - Lab at position(-7.5, 8.5) with 5 packs
  - Lab at position(-3.5, 8.5) with 4 packs
  - Lab at position(8.5, 8.5) with 161 packs
  - Multiple other labs at various positions with 13-16 packs each
- One lab without power
- One lab with empty input

ERROR TIPS

### Power Management Issues
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain consistent power supply (boiler reported "out of fuel" warning)

### Research Setup Issues
- Ensure prerequisites are researched before attempting advanced technologies (tried researching logistics-2 without logistic-science-pack prerequisite)
- Verify research requirements are met before starting research

### Inventory Management
- Maintain sufficient materials for crafting operations to avoid failed crafting attempts
- Keep track of required ingredients for multi-step crafting processes

### API Usage Errors
- Fix GetEntities implementation error with unhashable list type
- Verify inventory contents before attempting to insert items into labs

### Resource Management
- Ensure sufficient iron plates are available before attempting to craft items requiring them
- Plan crafting sequences to maintain required intermediate products
